thread.title: Manny Pacquiao and Amir Khan Confirm Fight Negotiations Amid Jeff Horn Rumours
thread.title_full: Manny Pacquiao and Amir Khan Confirm Fight Negotiations Amid Jeff Horn Rumours

author: Christopher Simpson
title: Manny Pacquiao and Amir Khan Confirm Fight Negotiations Amid Jeff Horn Rumours
text: Manny Pacquiao and Amir Khan Confirm Fight Negotiations Amid Jeff Horn Rumours Martin Willetts/Getty Images Manny Pacquiao and Amir Khan have both confirmed they have entered negotiations to fight one another. The pair took to Twitter on Thursday: Manny Pacquiao @mannypacquiao My team and I are in negotiations with Amir Khan for our next fight. Further announcement coming soon. #TeamPacquiao https://t.co/nW5jpmwVJs 2/23/2017, 7:21:35 AM Per ESPN (h/t the G uardian ), the move puts an end to Jeff Horn's hopes of fighting Pacquiao in his hometown of Brisbane, Australia, in April. The Filipino's promoter, Bob Arum, said: "The Australian deal is not going to happen now because Manny is trying to get a fight done in the United Arab Emirates. The people there favour him fighting Amir Khan."
